message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a unique and high-quality item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that $70 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $82. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $75?

I understand that $75 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $84. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $84. Would you be willing to meet me at $78?
I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $85. It's the highest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I'm not comfortable with $85, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to meet me at $82?
I'm not willing to go any higher than $85, but I'm willing to give you a small concession. I can offer it to you for $84.50. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to accept $84.50, but I'm willing to make one last attempt. Would you be willing to meet me at $81?
